name: SOUTH FLORIDA ADMIRALTY TRIAL LAWYERS ASSOCIATION
description: Association of maritime trial lawyers representing seafarers and crew members.
sampleDescriptions:
Issues related to the representation of plaintiffs in maritime cases as related to the Jones Act and arbitration.

Provisions impacting maritime employment: Jones Act, domestic and foreign seafarer and crew member court access. 

Issues related to the cruise industry, including recommencement of sailing in 2021.

S.593 - Alaska Tourism Recovery Act.

H.R.1318 - Alaska Tourism Restoration Act.

S.1105 - CRUISE Act

Issues related to the cruise industry, including recommencement of sailing.

Priorities for the Coast Guard and MARAD reauthorization bills.

Issues related to the representation of Plaintiffs in maritime cases as related to the Jones Act and arbitration.

Provisions impacting maritime employment, Jones Act and Seafarer Court Access.

National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2022.

Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act - HR 3684

Monitored status of CDC's No Sail Order (NSO), Conditional Sailing Order (CSO), as well as other agency policies impacting the cruise line industry.

Issues related to the cruise industry, including recommencement of sailing.

Issues related to the representation of Plaintiffs in maritime cases as related to the Jones Act and arbitration.

Provisions impacting maritime employment, Jones Act and Seafarer Court Access.

Priorities for the Coast Guard and MARAD reauthorization bills
